articles.author: Eric Revell
articles.title: Buffett explains Berkshire's reduced stake in Apple at annual company meeting - Fox Business
articles.description: Warren Buffett discussed Berkshire Hathaway's decision to reduce its stake in tech giant Apple at Berkshire's annual meeting on Saturday in Omaha, Nebraska.
articles.content:

articles.author: Matt Egan
articles.title: Trump Media’s accounting firm charged with ‘massive fraud’ - CNN
articles.description: BF Borgers, Trump Media & Technology Group’s independent accounting firm, was charged by the Securities and Exchange Commission on Friday with widespread fraud impacting more than 1,500 filings.
